Configurations#

  • Stores

Stores#

nefertem.StoreConfig#

class nefertem.utils.config.StoreConfig#

Store configuration class. This object define the configuration of a Store passed to a Client in order to create a Store object to interact with various backend storages.

field config: Optional[dict] = None#

Dictionary containing the configuration for the backend.

field isDefault: Optional[bool] = False#

Determine if a Store is the default one.

field name: str [Required]#

Store id.

field title: Optional[str] = None#

Human readable name for Store.

field type: typing_extensions.Literal[local, http, ftp, s3, azure, sql, odbc, _dummy] [Required]#

Store type to instantiate.

field uri: str [Required]#

Store URI.

Data Resource#

nefertem.DataResource#

class nefertem.utils.config.DataResource#

Resource configuration class. This object represents a physical resource present on a backend or a virtual resource rebuildable starting from other resources.

field description: Optional[str] = None#

A description of the DataResource.

field id: str [Optional]#

UUID of DataResource.

field name: str [Required]#

Name of the DataResource.

field package: Optional[str] = None#

Package name that DataResource belongs to.

field path: Union[str, List[str]] [Required]#

An URI (or a list of URI) that point to data.

field store: str [Required]#

Store name where to find the resource.

field tableSchema: Optional[Union[str, dict]] = None#

Resource table schema or path to table schema.

field title: Optional[str] = None#

Human readable name for the DataResource.

Run configuration#

nefertem.RunConfig#

class nefertem.utils.config.ExecConfig#

Generic configuration for run operation.

field execArgs: Optional[dict] = {}#

Execution arguments to pass to plugins.

field id: str [Optional]#

UUID of operation.

field library: Optional[str] = '_dummy'#

Library to use for performing an operation.

class nefertem.utils.config.RunConfig#

Run configuration object.

field inference: Optional[List[ExecConfig]] = [ExecConfig(id=UUID('04d35e96-c3e5-4a6c-aecc-d94f54b14550'), library='_dummy', execArgs={})]#

List of inference configuration.

field profiling: Optional[List[ExecConfig]] = [ExecConfig(id=UUID('9601090c-ed14-47c4-8461-ba27a940c746'), library='_dummy', execArgs={})]#

List of profiling configuration.

field validation: Optional[List[ExecConfig]] = [ExecConfig(id=UUID('3c652a60-a217-4e3d-a504-b16bb13d6d5d'), library='_dummy', execArgs={})]#

List of validation configuration.

Constraints#

Every constraint inherit from the base Contraint model.

nefertem.Constraint#

class nefertem.utils.config.Constraint#

Base model for constraint.

field id: str [Optional]#

UUID of constraint.

field name: str [Required]#

Constraint id.

field resources: List[str] [Required]#

List of resources affected by the constraint.

field title: str [Required]#

Human readable name for the constraint.

field weight: int [Required]#

Criticity of an eventual error encountered in the validation for the constraint.

nefertem.ConstraintFrictionless#

class nefertem.utils.config.ConstraintFrictionless#

Frictionless constraint.

field constraint: str [Required]#

Frictionless constraint typology.

field field: str [Required]#

Field to validate.

field fieldType: str [Required]#

Datatype of the field to validate.

field type: str = 'frictionless'#

Constraint type (“frictionless”).

field value: Any = None#

Value of the constraint.

nefertem.ConstraintFullFrictionless#

class nefertem.utils.config.ConstraintFullFrictionless#

Frictionless full schema constraint.

field tableSchema: dict [Required]#

Table schema to validate a resource.

field type: str = 'frictionless_schema'#

Constraint type (“frictionless_schema”).

nefertem.ConstraintDuckDB#

class nefertem.utils.config.ConstraintDuckDB#

DuckDB constraint.

field type: str = 'duckdb'#

Constraint type (“duckdb”).

Validated by:

  • check_for_emptiness

nefertem.ConstraintSqlAlchemy#

class nefertem.utils.config.ConstraintSqlAlchemy#

SqlAlchemy constraint.

field type: str = 'sqlalchemy'#

Constraint type (“sqlalchemy”).

Validated by:

  • check_for_emptiness

nefertem.ConstraintGreatExpectations#

class nefertem.utils.config.ConstraintGreatExpectations#

Great Expectation constraint.

field expectation: str [Required]#

Name of the expectation to apply to data.

field expectation_args: dict [Required]#

Arguments for the exepectation.

field type: str = 'great_expectations'#

Constraint type (“great_expectations”).
